import React from 'react'; import ViewUserDetailBasic from './ViewUserDetailBasic'; import ViewUserDetailStory from './ViewUserDetailStory'; import { getUserById, isAuthenticated } from '../../controllers/userController'; import { getYourQuestions } from '../../controllers/askController'; import { getYourBlogs } from '../../controllers/blogController'; import Notify from '../components/Notify'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; class ViewUserDetail extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { userPayload: {}, questions: [], blogs: [] } } async componentDidMount() { try { const _id = this.props.match.params.userId; // get info user info let userInfo = await getUserById(_id); if(Number(userInfo.message) === 404) { this.props.history.push("/404"); } // get questions let yourQuestions = await getYourQuestions(_id); // get blogs let yourBlogs = await getYourBlogs(_id); this.setState( { userPayload: userInfo, questions: yourQuestions, blogs: yourBlogs} ); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } } render() { const userPayloadInfo = this.state.userPayload; const {questions, blogs} = this.state; return (
